Articles.Content: Hey, I'm new to the forums. I've posted something recently... but it seems not to be coming up when I try to view it. It says I have no history of making it. However I know I made it.

Before you make 5 posts, each post needs to be allowed by a mod. This can take a little time, but it will be posted eventually (as long as the content meets community guidelines).

After 5 posts, your replies should take no longer than a few seconds to be posted, since mods will not need to review it.

Hope it helped
the newcomer forum is an exception to this, apparently
